info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 6 at 4:24AM CDT by NWS Nashville TN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee...
Wartrace Creek Near Wartrace affecting Bedford County.
For the Other Area Rivers...including Wartrace...elevated river levels are forecast.
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Wartrace Creek near Wartrace.
* WHEN...From early this morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Water begins to inundate Winette Ayers Park.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 9.8 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 430 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
